remarks: Value of a quotient structure.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 23-Feb-2015.)
statement:
qusval.u $e |- ( ph -> U = ( R /s .~ ) ) $.
qusval.v $e |- ( ph -> V = ( Base ` R ) ) $.
qusval.f $e |- F = ( x e. V |-> [ x ] .~ ) $.
qusval.e $e |- ( ph -> .~ e. W ) $.
qusval.r $e |- ( ph -> R e. Z ) $.
qusval $p |- ( ph -> U = ( F "s R ) ) $.
$d .~ x $.
$d R x $.
$d V x $.
$d ph x $.
